statement.p: The diagram below shows a triangle inscribed in a rectangle. The rectangle has width \displaystyle{9.00} and height \displaystyle{5.00}. One side of the triangle is a long side of the rectangle. The other triangle sides have lengths \displaystyle{5.83} and \displaystyle{7.81}.
What is the area of the shaded inscribed triangle? ft²
What is the area of the rectangle? ft²
What is the area of the unshaded parts of the rectangle? ft²
